pages.text: $(li)The Bread is an eatable food that can be used to heal your harmed tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroos$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft $(l)Kangaroo Burgers$(), $(l)Honey Bread$(), and $(l)Mulberry Bread$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too
